koohiiStory1: Shudder. If chestnut trees were sentient, shudder would be their state of mind as the tree shaker approaches. Note: Tree shakers are used commercially to harvest nuts and cider apples. A tree shaker makes a tree shudder causing all the ripe chestnuts to fall.
koohiiStory2: shudder: You’re in the state of mind of shuddering with fear when the chestnut tree is falling over towards you.
kunYomi: おそ.れる、 おのの.く、 ふる.える
